name: Firefly: A Myth Nerds Journey
summary: You joined Firefly Chat as a way to connect with new people. What you weren’t prepared for was a distress call from a mysterious person named Jamie. With their car broken down and Firefly Chat being the only app on their phone that seems to still be working, Jamie’s life is now in your hands. Communicate in real-time with Jamie, as you help them navigate the wicked and increasingly treacherous woods of the Bridgewater Triangle. Danger and mystery lurk everywhere. Do you possess the courage to lead them to safety? Or will the cursed woods drive both of you to the brink of insanity? Whatever you choose, Jamie’s soul is in your hands.
